TextView.android:text: Click on each treatment to know more...
Keep praticing good oral hygiene. Keep your teeth healthy!
Depending on its severity, the usual treatment for chipped tooth are bonding, crowns, veneers, and root canals.
Depending on its severity, the usual treatment for decayed tooth are fillings, tooth extraction, and crowns.
Depending on its severity, the usual treatment for lost tooth are bridges, root canal, and braces.
